caption.title: HBV sequences from H and M-DBS cluster phylogenetically with HBV strains from West Africa.
caption.p: The longest contig assembled to HBV was a 542 n.t. segment. This was used as input to create a phylogenetic tree using a neighbor-joining method. Letters correspond to HBV genotype. See S2 Fig for accession numbers corresponding to each HBV used in the analysis.
